title: I hate my Mac – Here’s why I’m moving to Windows
content:
As introductions go, this is definitely one of the more divisive ways to introduce myself. But where’s the fun in being prudent? After a decade of worshiping the shiny Apple logo on my Mac, I’ve finally seen the light and will be switching to my first Windows OS since Windows XP. Considering I just used

The post I hate my Mac – Here’s why I’m moving to Windows appeared first on XDA.
description: After a decade of being a Mac user, I’ve finally seen the light and will be switching to my first Windows OS since Windows XP.
